locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place is totally garbage 5 showers are free from hour plus and they make you wait here. If you go to the counter tell them the showers are free can we use it they will say no just wait for your number to be called. See the video ‚Ä¶

No women‚Äôs bathroom available for use. Elderly woman needed to use it but guy said too bad he was working on it. I can wait but really making old women wait??? Do better loves. You could have offered her a shower restroom at the very least.
Two hours wait for a shower. They have ten showers, but only three are available for use. Be prepared to spend half your day here is you want to use the shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ / hot shots should be legally banned here to park . So many  busted spots , u have to be lucky as ‚Äú family -guy‚Äù to find a spot here . Go buy a lotto if u find place to park here .   3 rd star for improved shower accuracy and availability.

Hlo  everybody including loves management there is one complaint from my side so i just booked a shower and there is nobody in line just me i waited for long 40 minutes my shower is not ready i went to the reception they said we are busy so ‚Ä¶
This being the only loves around I expected it to be a little bit busier but it wasn‚Äôt. There are plenty of shower and they are clean
I paid $18 for the hottest shower I‚Äôve had in months. Zero complaints!

‚Ä¶ be surprised how fast they‚Äôll tow your trailer here. Do not drop your trailer at this spot, do not leave your truck on the fuel island and go shower they‚Äôll tow you real quick. Everytime I‚Äôm at this spot they‚Äôre towing a swiftie here ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Overflowing trash at fuel islands, men's restroom. Trash and dirt inside. Coffee is nasty tasting. Very little condiments. Roller items looked nasty. Shower not cleaned. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the loves doesn't? Loves was almost my favorite big chain of truck stops. Yall almost had me. Loves and pilot has the cleanest shower rooms for truck drives but I know a lot of mom and pop truck stops that have nice clean shower rooms too.

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Truckers, don‚Äôt come here for a shower, it‚Äôs a waste of money. ‚Ä¶

By far the best out of state experience ever. I was blessed with a free shower, paid for by one of the employees. I can tell from everyone employed that it's ran by GOD fearing people. Coming from Michigan this was more than "a breath of ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I've had good and bad shower experiences here during the day pretty clean, during driver rush 4-8pm good luck feeling clean after you get out the shower.

3 stars for shower only, which was clean. Paid parking w first 2 hrs free. Ridiculous and continuous jam of trucks going in and out through the gates. Sat in a line to leave lot for 30 min @2pm on a Monday...Took a shower and went to do ‚Ä¶

First of all it is pay to park, ripping us off there already.  showers are filthy even though they advertise hospital grade clean. Such bull if you have to pay 13 $ per filthy shower.

At least iron skillet is decent.

‚Ä¶ and black hair cashier, Savana, was very pleasant. The shower attendant gave us extra towels then noticed my wife and I were showering together, gave us a bigger shower with heads on opposing walls. Awzome, clean and what a way to wake up ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ audience of strangers going in or coming out of the restroom. Also--there's garbage all over the parking lot and the trash cans are stuffed-and the showers aren't being cleaned properly. The toilet in my shower still had poo in it from the ‚Ä¶

Rude staff. $25 for overnight parking. $16 for shower. ATT sucks here.
Also reminder TA wifi is a scam so don't waste your money.

‚Ä¶ parking spots. Luckily we found a non reserved parking spot. There are more reserved spots than not. No showers at this Petro. The restroom has only 1 stall. We walked. 03 miles, 10 minutes to Love's to shower. The food looks ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is no consequence. On the fuel island, the girl comes in and notices the day shift cook called out, so she leaves, and there's no food. So I say, "Oh well," let me get a shower, and the showers are down. Washers are down. I, along with ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center #1315
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center #1315 may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nasty store!!! Shower was dirty, bathroom was not cleaned. pilot only owns the fuel area. Had to ask for my shower to be cleaned and still wasn‚Äôt cleaned. They do not honor team showers so keep that in mind. Also water doesn‚Äôt get very warm ‚Ä¶

Most bad situation in my life, showers is completely different than another stores, they don‚Äôt put towels inner, you need to ask, and the towels is the same size, small one, to use in the ground, they have two of them to me. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ get one or any of that other stuff.....Just fuel points...I dont pay to park or shower i am local driver but I heard that you pay for parking and shower.The DEF overflows out if you don't watch it on few pumps.....It's kepted clean at times

Good restaurants, they are cheap with shower water have to keep pushing a button to get water every 10 seconds ü§°. No free parking so hide in your bunk and ignore them knocking on your door, even for bobtails. Small bathroom‚Äôs were clean. ‚Ä¶
Very nice truck stop I often stop here and take shower and some food they have really good food like samosa and burgers , the staff are very helpful and kind and honest.
I visit here to take a shower and eat some food they provide me very nice and fast service and its the most cleanest truck stop in NJ.

It‚Äôs not the worst, but it‚Äôs independently owned.
They‚Äôre going to charge you $25 to park, as most spots are reserved spots.
The showers are $15, and the shower system is not like other Pilots.
It‚Äôs very weird and disorganized.
Nice place i stop here for get some diesel for my truck and for shower and get some food they gave me very friendly service and all the staff were very polite , everything was very neat and clean.
‚Ä¶ The "driver's lounge is cheap metal chairs, and the showers are a joke. ‚Ä¶
Restrooms, five showers, laundry, reserved parking, and diesel fuel islands available for truckers. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ .  Wasn't bad. Inside was clean and stocked. Bathrooms were clean. Didn't shower here so not sure about that. Parking lot was the worst part. Dodged craters all the way to my parking spot, but did find a free spot. They still haven't put ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: Shane Sorrell (Sig in a truck)_‚Ä¶_._Wasn't_bad._Inside_was_clean_and_stocked._Bat_8 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Wasn't gonna say anything but really.. Took a shower 1am. Open the toilet, clearly hasn't been clean, or even flushed. I get that we're truckers but after a long hard day of work.. at least flush the toilet if you're not going to clean the ‚Ä¶

This place is trash. No restaurant and now the starting to pay to park. Went in to shower and can't because of no towels. I will bypass this hole from now on. Update just stopped here again and the pay to stay is in effect. You must 25.00 ‚Ä¶

As just a traveler, I was super grateful for the shower! Clean, great water pressure and the heat lamps for after were a nice touch.
Thanks üòä ‚Ä¶

At all  TA's / Petro's  you are able to take a shower unless there are water issues. Was told "that the showers wouldn't be available until like 9am". No signage on kiosk that stats this and now out a shower credit. Instead of having ‚Ä¶
Only the good thing was the water pressure in the shower. Laundry wasn‚Äôt working. Be cautious there are huge potholes in the parking lot.

‚Ä¶ for $10.00. restaurant closed, if it wasn't for paid parking $22.00 a day this place would be shut now. Fuel, shop, shower TV room. I have been here for 3 days, most of the time the shop has been closed or completely there's no work to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Shower system always down. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the renovation, do NOT come. System not working. Receipt not working. CASH ONLY, no cards. No FOOD. I heard drivers having an issue getting a shower while I was having an issue paying for reserved parking. Only 1 register. Long lines. Smh!

‚Ä¶ the parking. They also don‚Äôt tell these drivers not to park ten feet out so people can get in their spot. My shower wasn‚Äôt clean but they gave it to me. The gentleman that was cleaning the showers gave me a different one. The country pride ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: They when you trying to get shower if you show your pilot card they immediately say that showers not working but if you show some cash or credit card then everything working in order somehow. They're pilot licensed but don't support ‚Ä¶

It shouldn't be called Pilot. They don't honor your rewards card. You can't get a shower with the card. You have to put diesel in your car or pay for the shower. Never come here. Parking is all paid. And the food they sell is disgusting. Do ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This location has an RV dump, large parking lot, clean, well stocked store, and clean, well designed showers. However, the soft water leaves you feeling slimy. I prefer feeling clean after my shower.
The parking lot here is very large but almost always full. If you need parking come here early, Clean shower,  nice staff and well managed store.

‚Ä¶ no manners or respect whatsoever these days. They should add more self checkout machines so people don‚Äôt have to be bothered with negative energy. Besides that it‚Äôs not the biggest lot but shower pressure was great and available at 7:30 pm.
Pilot not have enough staff to clean shower and this happen many locations.
Showers are not working!.. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have a full grill with chicken, pot roast etc. According to a manager they have no plans on bringing those options back. They built a shop that took away badly needed parking. The ups are the shower was clean and the cashier was friendly.

This location has problematic with hot water for shower. I couldn't take shower today and all body wipes are sold out, but at least can get hot food of pizza, hamburger, potato wedges and other microwave items in heated cabin along with ‚Ä¶

Used to have more parking.
Corporate decided to wipe out a couple dozen spots to increase profits.
Always a wait for a shower.
Whatever, Jim Haslam appreciates you....
According to customer service voicemail wait time.
Yeah, right.

The system that opens the shower doors doesn't work properly.  So they are just leaving the shower doors open, which is a huge security risk. Sometimes they do close the doors and then the attendants get an attitude when you tell them to ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking spaces, clean shower and good assortment of food. But I have 1 problem here: the ingredients are not indicated on salads and soup. I got surprised when I found ham on the bottom of the salad and had to throw the whole salad ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Penn Jersey Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ service they give you is the best I have ever seen. If you get 80 or more gallons you get free parking. If you get 100 gallons it‚Äôs free parking and free shower. Whenever you fuel here they always give a free drink! Love coming here

This spot is a good location! Clean restroom and shower. Conveniently located near food, stores and such!(Chipotle, IHOP, WAWA, Aldi and more) Plus, they have a nice variety of stuff in the store as well. The staff were polite, friendly and ‚Ä¶

This Truck Stop is trash. They want to charge you $30 to  park, $18 for a shower, Restroom Nasty and unclean. The store has hardly anything to offer. Very limited parking available. They are taking advantage of the fact that there is ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ever been to. The diesel quality i get here is wayyyy better compared to the other truck stops i used to go to. My truck does more miles ever since i started fueling here. If you pump 100 gallons they give you free parking & free shower!!!!

Nice, clean truck stop! Friendly staff, not a lot of parking for trucks, $20.00 to park but very quiet, restrooms and showers spotless, $12.00 to shower. Good selection of sandwiches, snacks available. Will keep this one on my list!!!
Pay for parking in this part of the states it's ok.  Shower are dirty like not possible, old soap everywhere , floor covered of layers of layers of dirty.  But the employee was nice and polite
You have to pay to park and the showers are dirty not worth the price for the shower. The employee was very nice.  They would have gotten 4 stars but showers  being dirty
Better than I expected. On top of diesel being a reasonable price if you buy 80 gallons you get a free shower and parking
Very small place.  Parking is 20 dollars per semi truck.  Kind of convenient store and shower are in the building.
Raised price to park to 20 bucks and a seriously nasty shower is 10.will not be back
